data.name: Generic Kart Racing
data.detailed_description:
Generic Kart Racing is a celebration of the retro, 16-bit kart racers of old - a modern twist on the ol' tried and true kart racing formula!

Currently planned to feature:

  • Competitive, skill-based driving (with power-ups, of course!)
  • A fully-fledged 90s-inspired Adventure mode - race to save the world!
  • Race against AI in the classic Grand Prix mode
  • Ruin your friendships with 4-player split-screen racing
  • Time Trial - think you're the fastest racer? Think again!
  • Unlock content the old fashioned way - none of this microtransactions nonsense
  • And SO much more

Race across a smorgasbord of courses!

GKR is currently planned to feature 24 tracks at launch, covering a wide variety of locales! Including a stunning tropical beach, an underground sewer, a busy highway, an alien planet and even someone's kitchen!

Choose from an eclectic selection of characters!

GKR features a modest 8 characters to choose from on the starting roster. While they're definitely a kooky bunch, who's to say we didn't leave plenty of space around them on the character select screen for a reason?

Thank you!

Thanks for taking an interest in GKR! There's still buckets of stuff yet to be seen and while there's no release date yet, we're hoping to release a demo in the near future - for us to gain valuable gameplay feedback and for you to start practicing for your race against Totu... good luck!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3-4130
  • Graphics: GTX 560Ti or AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
